name: Action
description: The Action class is used to describe any actions taken by the analyzer in response to the event.  It is represented in the IDMEF DTD as follows:

category.name: category
category.description: The default value is "other".  (See also Section 10.)

values.description: Anything not in one of the above categories.
A block of some sort was installed to prevent an attack from reaching its destination.  The block could be a port block, address block, etc., or disabling a user account.
A notification message of some sort was sent out-of-band (via pager, e-mail, etc.).  Does not include the transmission of this alert.
A system, computer, or user was taken offline, as when the computer is shut down or a user is logged off.
